=======================================
  Demuxable Formats
=======================================
  "gsm": raw GSM
  "wsaud": Westwood Studios audio format
  "thp": THP
  "iv8": A format generated by IndigoVision 8000 video server
  "sdp": SDP
  "mpegtsraw": MPEG-2 raw transport stream format
  "dv": DV video format
  "f64be": PCM 64 bit floating-point big-endian format
  "apc": CRYO APC format
  "bin": Binary text
  "u8": PCM unsigned 8 bit format
  "yop": Psygnosis YOP Format
  "idf": iCE Draw File
  "matroska,webm": Matroska/WebM file format
  "vc1test": VC-1 test bitstream format
  "mm": American Laser Games MM format
  "flac": raw FLAC
  "rm": RealMedia format
  "s16le": PCM signed 16 bit little-endian format
  "nc": NC camera feed format
  "cdxl": Commodore CDXL video format
  "wsvqa": Westwood Studios VQA format
  "g729": G.729 raw format demuxer
  "ivf": On2 IVF
  "swf": Flash format
  "mpegts": MPEG-2 transport stream format
  "dxa": DXA
  "film_cpk": Sega FILM/CPK format
  "u16le": PCM unsigned 16 bit little-endian format
  "f64le": PCM 64 bit floating-point little-endian format
  "anm": Deluxe Paint Animation
  "bfi": Brute Force & Ignorance
  "idcin": id Cinematic format
  "yuv4mpegpipe": YUV4MPEG pipe format
  "vc1": raw VC-1
  "microdvd": MicroDVD subtitle format
  "RoQ": id RoQ format
  "mlp": raw MLP
  "flic": FLI/FLC/FLX animation format
  "nsv": Nullsoft Streaming Video
  "cdg": CD Graphics Format
  "s16be": PCM signed 16 bit big-endian format
  "tmv": 8088flex TMV
  "jv": Bitmap Brothers JV
  "h261": raw H.261
  "wtv": Windows Television (WTV)
  "f32be": PCM 32 bit floating-point big-endian format
  "amr": 3GPP AMR file format
  "bethsoftvid": Bethesda Softworks VID format
  "pva": TechnoTrend PVA file and stream format
  "shn": raw Shorten
  "msnwctcp": MSN TCP Webcam stream
  "dsicin": Delphine Software International CIN format
  "mjpeg": raw MJPEG video
  "voc": Creative Voice file format
  "dshow": DirectShow capture
  "image2": image2 sequence
  "u32be": PCM unsigned 32 bit big-endian format
  "nut": NUT format
  "cavsvideo": raw Chinese AVS video
  "mov,mp4,m4a,3gp,3g2,mj2": QuickTime/MPEG-4/Motion JPEG 2000 format
  "ffmetadata": FFmpeg metadata in text format
  "rpl": RPL/ARMovie format
  "latm": raw LOAS/LATM
  "tiertexseq": Tiertex Limited SEQ format
  "wv": WavPack
  "gxf": GXF format
  "pmp": Playstation Portable PMP format
  "f32le": PCM 32 bit floating-point little-endian format
  "aiff": Audio IFF
  "avs": AVS format
  "mpegvideo": raw MPEG video
  "dts": raw DTS
  "siff": Beam Software SIFF
  "vmd": Sierra VMD format
  "IFF": Interchange File Format
  "lavfi": Libavfilter virtual input device
  "nuv": NuppelVideo format
  "caf": Apple Core Audio Format
  "s8": PCM signed 8 bit format
  "rso": Lego Mindstorms RSO format
  "mmf": Yamaha SMAF
  "filmstrip": Adobe Filmstrip
  "smk": Smacker video
  "dirac": raw Dirac
  "mvi": Motion Pixels MVI format
  "avi": AVI format
  "s32be": PCM signed 32 bit big-endian format
  "aea": MD STUDIO audio
  "r3d": REDCODE R3D format
  "4xm": 4X Technologies format
  "vqf": Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corporation (NTT) TwinVQ
  "spdif": IEC 61937 (compressed data in S/PDIF)
  "image2pipe": piped image2 sequence
  "eac3": raw E-AC-3
  "mpc": Musepack
  "rtp": RTP input format
  "u24be": PCM unsigned 24 bit big-endian format
  "c93": Interplay C93
  "ogg": Ogg
  "xa": Maxis XA File Format
  "h264": raw H.264 video format
  "lmlm4": lmlm4 raw format
  "ape": Monkey's Audio
  "tta": True Audio
  "ac3": raw AC-3
  "dnxhd": raw DNxHD (SMPTE VC-3)
  "MTV": MTV format
  "smjpeg": Loki SDL MJPEG
  "qcp": QCP format
  "au": SUN AU format
  "s32le": PCM signed 32 bit little-endian format
  "adx": CRI ADX
  "w64": Sony Wave64 format
  "flv": FLV format
  "ingenient": raw Ingenient MJPEG
  "sox": SoX native format
  "rtsp": RTSP input format
  "ffm": FFM (FFserver live feed) format
  "mp3": MPEG audio layer 2/3
  "bmv": Discworld II BMV
  "oma": Sony OpenMG audio
  "u32le": PCM unsigned 32 bit little-endian format
  "h263": raw H.263
  "xbin": eXtended BINary text (XBIN)
  "truehd": raw TrueHD
  "act": ACT Voice file format
  "loas": LOAS AudioSyncStream
  "ass": Advanced SubStation Alpha subtitle format
  "s24be": PCM signed 24 bit big-endian format
  "adf": Artworx Data Format
  "rl2": RL2 format
  "sol": Sierra SOL format
  "daud": D-Cinema audio format
  "mxg": MxPEG clip file format
  "psxstr": Sony Playstation STR format
  "ipmovie": Interplay MVE format
  "g723_1": G.723.1 format
  "wav": WAV format
  "u16be": PCM unsigned 16 bit big-endian format
  "bit": G.729 BIT file format
  "alaw": PCM A-law format
  "ea": Electronic Arts Multimedia Format
  "mpeg": MPEG-PS format
  "sap": SAP input format
  "lxf": VR native stream format (LXF)
  "tty": Tele-typewriter
  "xmv": Microsoft XMV
  "ico": Microsoft Windows ICO
  "rawvideo": raw video format
  "asf": ASF format
  "s24le": PCM signed 24 bit little-endian format
  "dfa": Chronomaster DFA
  "mxf": Material eXchange Format
  "vfwcap": VfW video capture
  "ISS": Funcom ISS format
  "srt": SubRip subtitle format
  "wc3movie": Wing Commander III movie format
  "g722": raw G.722
  "bink": Bink
  "mulaw": PCM mu-law format
  "u24le": PCM unsigned 24 bit little-endian format
  "sbg": SBaGen binaural beats script
  "ea_cdata": Electronic Arts cdata
  "mpc8": Musepack SV8
  "txd": Renderware TeXture Dictionary
  "aac": raw ADTS AAC
  "m4v": raw MPEG-4 video format
  "hls,applehttp": Apple HTTP Live Streaming format
  "xwma": Microsoft xWMA
=======================================
  Muxable Formats
=======================================
  "u32le": PCM unsigned 32 bit little-endian format
  "ivf": On2 IVF
  "nut": NUT format
  "dvd": MPEG-2 PS format (DVD VOB)
  "3gp": 3GP format
  "asf": ASF format
  "eac3": raw E-AC-3
  "rm": RealMedia format
  "gxf": GXF format
  "f32le": PCM 32 bit floating-point little-endian format
  "mmf": Yamaha SMAF
  "sap": SAP output format
  "cavsvideo": raw Chinese AVS video
  "wtv": Windows Television (WTV)
  "g722": raw G.722
  "u32be": PCM unsigned 32 bit big-endian format
  "latm": LOAS/LATM
  "ogg": Ogg
  "mpeg1video": raw MPEG-1 video
  "3g2": 3GP2 format
  "amr": 3GPP AMR file format
  "ffm": FFM (FFserver live feed) format
  "rawvideo": raw video format
  "h261": raw H.261
  "s32be": PCM signed 32 bit big-endian format
  "mlp": raw MLP
  "rtsp": RTSP output format
  "caf": Apple Core Audio Format
  "yuv4mpegpipe": YUV4MPEG pipe format
  "oma": Sony OpenMG audio
  "vcd": MPEG-1 System format (VCD)
  "u24le": PCM unsigned 24 bit little-endian format
  "ipod": iPod H.264 MP4 format
  "dts": raw DTS
  "swf": Flash format
  "aiff": Audio IFF
  "s32le": PCM signed 32 bit little-endian format
  "mjpeg": raw MJPEG video
  "g723_1": raw G.723.1
  "wav": WAV format
  "framecrc": framecrc testing format
  "rtp": RTP output format
  "bit": G.729 BIT file format
  "alaw": PCM A-law format
  "mpeg": MPEG-1 System format
  "u24be": PCM unsigned 24 bit big-endian format
  "ismv": ISMV/ISMA (Smooth Streaming) format
  "dv": DV video format
  "srt": SubRip subtitle format
  "adx": CRI ADX
  "s24be": PCM signed 24 bit big-endian format
  "microdvd": MicroDVD subtitle format
  "RoQ": raw id RoQ format
  "gif": GIF Animation
  "webm": WebM file format
  "framemd5": Per-frame MD5 testing format
  "rso": Lego Mindstorms RSO format
  "avm2": Flash 9 (AVM2) format
  "adts": ADTS AAC
  "voc": Creative Voice file format
  "dirac": raw Dirac
  "matroska": Matroska file format
  "s16be": PCM signed 16 bit big-endian format
  "mpegts": MPEG-2 transport stream format
  "mpjpeg": MIME multipart JPEG format
  "avi": AVI format
  "spdif": IEC 61937 (used on S/PDIF - IEC958)
  "flac": raw FLAC
  "image2": image2 sequence
  "u16le": PCM unsigned 16 bit little-endian format
  "mp4": MP4 format
  "mulaw": PCM mu-law format
  "ac3": raw AC-3
  "rcv": VC-1 test bitstream
  "dnxhd": raw DNxHD (SMPTE VC-3)
  "matroska": Matroska file format
  "s24le": PCM signed 24 bit little-endian format
  "vob": MPEG-2 PS format (VOB)
  "mxf": Material eXchange Format
  "au": SUN AU format
  "sox": SoX native format
  "flv": FLV format
  "image2pipe": piped image2 sequence
  "u16be": PCM unsigned 16 bit big-endian format
  "mp3": MPEG audio layer 3
  "f64be": PCM 64 bit floating-point big-endian format
  "crc": CRC testing format
  "a64": a64 - video for Commodore 64
  "truehd": raw TrueHD
  "mpeg2video": raw MPEG-2 video
  "mxf_d10": Material eXchange Format, D-10 Mapping
  "m4v": raw MPEG-4 video format
  "s8": PCM signed 8 bit format
  "ffmetadata": FFmpeg metadata in text format
  "asf_stream": ASF format
  "smjpeg": Loki SDL MJPEG
  "mp2": MPEG audio layer 2
  "f64le": PCM 64 bit floating-point little-endian format
  "h263": raw H.263
  "psp": PSP MP4 format
  "daud": D-Cinema audio format
  "mkvtimestamp_v2": extract pts as timecode v2 format, as defined by mkvtoolnix
  "svcd": MPEG-2 PS format (VOB)
  "null": raw null video format
  "md5": MD5 testing format
  "s16le": PCM signed 16 bit little-endian format
  "filmstrip": Adobe Filmstrip
  "ass": Advanced SubStation Alpha subtitle format
  "segment": segment muxer
  "mov": MOV format
  "f32be": PCM 32 bit floating-point big-endian format
  "h264": raw H.264 video format
  "u8": PCM unsigned 8 bit format
=======================================
  Decodeable Codecs
=======================================
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_RPZA (rpza): QuickTime video (RPZA)
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_G729 (g729): G.729
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_VIXL (xl): Miro VideoXL
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_SUNRAST (sunrast): Sun Rasterfile image
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MSRLE (msrle): Microsoft RLE
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_H264 (h264): H.264 / AVC / MPEG-4 AVC / MPEG-4 part 10
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_ROQ_DPCM (roq_dpcm): DPCM id RoQ
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_ADPCM_SBPRO_4 (adpcm_sbpro_4): ADPCM Sound Blaster Pro 4-bit
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_F32BE (pcm_f32be): PCM 32-bit floating point big-endian
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_SOL_DPCM (sol_dpcm): DPCM Sol
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_ROQ (roqvideo): id RoQ video
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_H263I (h263i): Intel H.263
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_ADPCM_SWF (adpcm_swf): ADPCM Shockwave Flash
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_GSM (gsm): GSM
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_GSM_MS (gsm_ms): GSM Microsoft variant
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_XWD (xwd): XWD (X Window Dump) image
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MSMPEG4V3 (msmpeg4): MPEG-4 part 2 Microsoft variant version 3
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MSVIDEO1 (msvideo1): Microsoft Video 1
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_ZORK (pcm_zork): PCM Zork
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_H263 (h263): H.263 / H.263-1996, H.263+ / H.263-1998 / H.263 version 2
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_WNV1 (wnv1): Winnov WNV1
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_F32LE (pcm_f32le): PCM 32-bit floating point little-endian
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_ADPCM_THP (adpcm_thp): ADPCM Nintendo Gamecube THP
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_SVQ1 (svq1): Sorenson Vector Quantizer 1 / Sorenson Video 1 / SVQ1
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MSZH (mszh): LCL (LossLess Codec Library) MSZH
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_IMC (imc): IMC (Intel Music Coder)
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_RL2 (rl2): RL2 video
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_XAN_WC3 (xan_wc3): Wing Commander III / Xan
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_MACE3 (mace3): MACE (Macintosh Audio Compression/Expansion) 3:1
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_RAWVIDEO (rawvideo): raw video
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_INTERPLAY_DPCM (interplay_dpcm): DPCM Interplay
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_SVQ3 (svq3): Sorenson Vector Quantizer 3 / Sorenson Video 3 / SVQ3
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_XAN_WC4 (xan_wc4): Wing Commander IV / Xxan
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_ADPCM_XA (adpcm_xa): ADPCM CDROM XA
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_F64BE (pcm_f64be): PCM 64-bit floating point big-endian
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_U32BE (pcm_u32be): PCM unsigned 32-bit big-endian
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_ADPCM_YAMAHA (adpcm_yamaha): ADPCM Yamaha
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_WESTWOOD_SND1 (ws_snd1): Westwood Audio (SND1)
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_TARGA (targa): Truevision Targa image
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MPEG2VIDEO (mpegvideo): MPEG-1 video
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MSMPEG4V1 (msmpeg4v1): MPEG-4 part 2 Microsoft variant version 1
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_FFWAVESYNTH (wavesynth): Wave synthesis pseudo-codec
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_H261 (h261): H.261
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_WMV3 (wmv3): Windows Media Video 9
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_WMV3IMAGE (wmv3image): Windows Media Video 9 Image
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MPEG4 (mpeg4): MPEG-4 part 2
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_RV20 (rv20): RealVideo 2.0
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_GIF (gif): GIF (Graphics Interchange Format)
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_U32LE (pcm_u32le): PCM unsigned 32-bit little-endian
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_ALAW (pcm_alaw): PCM A-law / G.711 A-law
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_THEORA (theora): Theora
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_TIERTEXSEQVIDEO (tiertexseqvideo): Tiertex Limited SEQ video
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MSMPEG4V2 (msmpeg4v2): MPEG-4 part 2 Microsoft variant version 2

CODEC_TYPE_SUBTITLE CODEC_ID_SSA (ass): Advanced SubStation Alpha subtitle

CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_BLURAY (pcm_bluray): PCM signed 16|20|24-bit big-endian for Blu-ray media

=======================================
  Encodeable Codecs
=======================================
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_ADPCM_SWF (adpcm_swf): ADPCM Shockwave Flash
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_F32BE (pcm_f32be): PCM 32-bit floating point big-endian
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_SUNRAST (sunrast): Sun Rasterfile image
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_XWD (xwd): XWD (X Window Dump) image
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_SVQ1 (svq1): Sorenson Vector Quantizer 1 / Sorenson Video 1 / SVQ1
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MSMPEG4V3 (msmpeg4): MPEG-4 part 2 Microsoft variant version 3
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_ROQ (roqvideo): id RoQ video
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_H263P (h263p): H.263+ / H.263-1998 / H.263 version 2
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_F32LE (pcm_f32le): PCM 32-bit floating point little-endian
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_ADPCM_YAMAHA (adpcm_yamaha): ADPCM Yamaha
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_F64BE (pcm_f64be): PCM 64-bit floating point big-endian

CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_MSVIDEO1 (msvideo1): Microsoft Video-1

CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_H263 (h263): H.263 / H.263-1996
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_H261 (h261): H.261
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_A64_MULTI5 (a64multi5): Multicolor charset for Commodore 64, extended with 5th color (colram)
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_U32LE (pcm_u32le): PCM unsigned 32-bit little-endian

CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_WMAV2 (wmav2): Windows Media Audio 2
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_ZLIB (zlib): LCL (LossLess Codec Library) ZLIB
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_ADPCM_MS (adpcm_ms): ADPCM Microsoft
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_HUFFYUV (huffyuv): Huffyuv / HuffYUV
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_PGM (pgm): PGM (Portable GrayMap) image
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_DPX (dpx): DPX image
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_U16BE (pcm_u16be): PCM unsigned 16-bit big-endian
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_VORBIS (vorbis): Vorbis
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_YUV4 (yuv4): Uncompressed packed 4:2:0
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_U8 (pcm_u8): PCM unsigned 8-bit
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_DNXHD (dnxhd): VC3/DNxHD
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_MP2 (mp2): MP2 (MPEG audio layer 2)
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_CLJR (cljr): Cirrus Logic AccuPak
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_V210 (v210): Uncompressed 4:2:2 10-bit
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_PCX (pcx): PC Paintbrush PCX image
CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO CODEC_ID_Y41P (y41p): Uncompressed YUV 4:1:1 12-bit
CODEC_TYPE_AUDIO CODEC_ID_PCM_S32LE (pcm_s32le): PCM signed 32-bit little-endian
=======================================
  com.xuggle.xuggler.IContainer Properties
=======================================
  probesize; default= 5000000; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for probesize: set probing size
  packetsize; default= 0; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for packetsize: set packet size
  fflags; default= 0; valid values=(-ignidx; -genpts; -nofillin; -noparse; -igndts; -discardcorrupt; -sortdts; -keepside; -latm; ); type=PROPERTY_FLAGS;
    help for fflags: no help available
  analyzeduration; default= 5000000; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for analyzeduration: how many microseconds are analyzed to estimate duration
  cryptokey; default= 5000000; type=PROPERTY_BINARY;
    help for cryptokey: decryption key
  indexmem; default= 1048576; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for indexmem: max memory used for timestamp index (per stream)
  rtbufsize; default= 3041280; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for rtbufsize: max memory used for buffering real-time frames
  fdebug; default= 0; valid values=(-ts; ); type=PROPERTY_FLAGS;
    help for fdebug: print specific debug info
  max_delay; default= 0; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for max_delay: maximum muxing or demuxing delay in microseconds
  fpsprobesize; default= -1; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for fpsprobesize: number of frames used to probe fps
  audio_preload; default= 0; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for audio_preload: microseconds by which audio packets should be interleaved earlier
  chunk_duration; default= 0; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for chunk_duration: microseconds for each chunk
  chunk_size; default= 0; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for chunk_size: size in bytes for each chunk
  f_err_detect; default= 1; valid values=(+crccheck; -bitstream; -buffer; -explode; -careful; -compliant; -aggressive; ); type=PROPERTY_FLAGS;
    help for f_err_detect: set error detection flags (deprecated; use err_detect, save via avconv)
  err_detect; default= 1; valid values=(+crccheck; -bitstream; -buffer; -explode; -careful; -compliant; -aggressive; ); type=PROPERTY_FLAGS;
    help for err_detect: set error detection flags

    help for qblur: video quantizer scale blur (VBR)

    help for qmin: min video quantizer scale (VBR)

    help for qmax: max video quantizer scale (VBR)

    help for qdiff: max difference between the quantizer scale (VBR)

    help for bf: use 'frames' B frames

    help for b_qfactor: qp factor between p and b frames

    help for bug: workaround not auto detected encoder bugs

    help for lelim: single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)

=======================================
  com.xuggle.xuggler.IVideoResampler Properties
=======================================
  sws_flags; default= 32; valid values=(-fast_bilinear; -bilinear; -bicubic; -experimental; -neighbor; +area; -bicublin; -gauss; -sinc; -lanczos; -spline; -print_info; -accurate_rnd; -full_chroma_int; -full_chroma_inp; -bitexact; ); type=PROPERTY_FLAGS;
    help for sws_flags: scaler flags
  srcw; default= 200; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for srcw: source width
  srch; default= 200; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for srch: source height
  dstw; default= 100; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for dstw: destination width
  dsth; default= 100; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for dsth: destination height
  src_format; default= 2; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for src_format: source format
  dst_format; default= 0; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for dst_format: destination format
  src_range; default= 0; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for src_range: source range
  dst_range; default= 0; type=PROPERTY_INT;
    help for dst_range: destination range
  param0; default= 123456.000000; type=PROPERTY_DOUBLE;
    help for param0: scaler param 0
  param1; default= 123456.000000; type=PROPERTY_DOUBLE;
    help for param1: scaler param 1
